des: "This easy entree gives new meaning to the ham-n-cheese sandwich! Tastes great topped with mayonnaise and tomato slices!"
ins: Combine ham and pineapple in skillet.  Saute over medium heat until most of the pineapple juice has cooked off.  Separate mixture into 5 sections in skillet and place one slice of cheese on top of each; cook until cheese melts. Serve on top of warm croissants.
